description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: Light fixture designing - an exhibition of the Pavillon de Marsan in the Louvre. Jousting Lyon style - French waterjousting championships. Comic strips - 3rd International Convention. 2. The Inter-Parliamentary Union - 59th annual conference in Paris and Versailles. 3. The Iron Age at the Saint-Germain Museum - new rooms for the antiquities and the Iron Age of ancient Gaul. 4. Concert at Thoiry Park - Jean-Baptiste Lully's works played at Thoiry Zoo.
